__TOC__

These tests are to test the functionality of the firefox-3.0 package.  Please try to run all of the following tests.

When testing Firefox, please start it from the command line with <code>firefox -safe-mode</code> so that your extensions don't interfere.  False positives aren't fun to track down.

Report any bugs you find using the following command in a terminal:
<pre>
ubuntu-bug firefox-3.0
</pre>

You can learn more about reporting bugs at http://wiki.ubuntu.com/ReportingBugs.
